short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automated Bluebook source management for the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Navy simplifies Bluebook legal citations by automatically extracting source information from web pages and formatting it correctly. No more manual lookups of rules and abbreviations.

Features:
• AI-powered extraction of citation details from any webpage
• Automatic Bluebook-format citation generation
• One-click citation insertion into documents
• Project-based source organization
• Support for cases, statutes, articles, and other legal sources

This extension integrates with Navy's web interface at https://navycite.com and its forthcoming Microsoft Word and Google Docs add-ins.

Built for law students, legal professionals, and journal editors who work with Bluebook citations. Navy handles the complex formatting rules so you can focus on your writing.

Note: Not affiliated with or authorized by The Bluebook®: A Uniform System of Citation.
